title: SVG Web Component
description: SVG Web Components is a modern, framework-agnostic icon system built as a native Web Component. It provides a simple, declarative way to include SVG icons in any web application with dynamic loading capabilities and full customization support.

title: ISC Platform
description: ISC Auction is a specialized digital auction platform under Emazad, dedicated to managing and facilitating the sale of assets for the Islamic Services Company (ISC). The platform provides a secure and fully online environment for listing and bidding on a variety of assets, ensuring transparency, efficiency, and compliance with official auction standards. It enables participants to engage in real-time auctions with ease, supporting ISC’s efforts to streamline asset disposal through trusted digital channels.

title: Hadhinatalmasaken Platform
description: Hadhinatalmasaken is a digital platform under Emazad, designed to manage and auction residential housing projects in Saudi Arabia. It offers a streamlined and transparent process for listing, bidding, and managing housing units online. The platform supports real estate developers, investors, and government entities by enabling efficient project onboarding, secure transactions, and full integration with national digital services.

title: Tahaqaq
description: Tahaqaq is a trusted digital system designed to verify candidate information during the recruitment process. By sourcing data directly from official platforms such as GOSI, Yaqeen, and Wathq, Tahaqaq ensures accuracy, speeds up hiring, and enhances decision-making. The platform helps employers validate key personal and employment details, improve hiring quality, reduce fraud, and streamline HR operations all in a secure and fully digital environment.

title: SARD
description: AI-powered collaborative script writing platform designed for content creators and screenwriters. The application provides intelligent content generation, real-time collaboration features, script analysis tools, and automated quality assurance through customizable rule books to streamline the creative writing process and enhance script quality.

title: Qahtani Auctions Platform
description: Digital auction portal integrated with Saudi Arabia’s official Emazad platform. It provides a secure and fully online environment for participating in auctions of vehicles, industrial equipment, scrap materials, and real estate. Backed by Al-Qahtani Auction Company, the platform offers a professional bidding experience with national reach, transparent processes, and end-to-end digital services — from registration to final asset transfer.

title: Sukuk Platform
description: Platform is a digital service provided to streamline and digitize the process of converting handwritten real estate title deeds into electronic format. The platform offers a seamless, end-to-end experience for property owners in Riyadh and affiliated regions, allowing them to submit requests, track progress, and receive updated digital deeds without visiting government offices.

title: Emazad
description: Official electronic auction platform in Saudi Arabia, operated by THIQAH Business Services. It enables individuals, companies, and government entities to participate in secure and transparent online auctions for real estate and other assets. The platform offers a fully digital experience from registration and bidding to payment and transfer ensuring efficiency, accessibility, and fairness across all transactions.

title: Eqeel Platform
description: Eqeel is a digital agricultural trade management system designed to streamline financial operations between farmers and merchants. The platform enables end-to-end handling of contracts, invoices, revenues, daily reports, and performance tracking. With features like role-based permissions, invoice status control, debt tracking, and dashboard analytics, Eqeel ensures transparency, accountability, and efficiency in managing farm transactions and commercial settlements. It supports seamless coordination between all stakeholders, helping agricultural businesses operate with clarity and control.

title: Tommor Platform
description: A custom-built web application designed to digitize and manage the operations of agricultural produce sales. The system supports multi-role users such as marketers, traders, farmers, and financial supervisors. It facilitates contract management, profit calculation, user roles, sales tracking, and financial reporting within a highly structured role-based access control environment.

title: OffCourse Kuwait
description: OffCourse Kuwait is a web-based management platform tailored for a nutrition-focused business. It streamlines customer order processing, sales tracking, nutrition planning, and delivery workflows. The platform supports both operational staff and admin-level users with a comprehensive dashboard, analytics, and inventory management all presented in a fully Arabic RTL interface.

title: Graphic Designer Portfolio
description: Professional portfolio UI Pages for a graphic designer. The website serves as a digital showcase of his professional services, work portfolio, and personal brand.

title: YaOsta
description: This website help owner to display all his team services and user can request service and track his request.

title: Technical Review Management System
description: A robust web and mobile platform designed to digitize and optimize technical review processes for Shoaa Water Company. It centralizes the management of infrastructure reports, meter installations, field inspections, and administrative workflows across all organizational levels.This enterprise solution improves coordination, ensures data consistency, and enhances operational control enabling faster reviews, greater accountability, and more efficient water infrastructure management.

title: Water Meter Management System
description: An enterprise-grade digital platform designed to transform water utility operations. It replaces manual meter reading with a fully integrated solution combining mobile field data collection, centralized data management, and automated review workflows.Built to reduce costs and improve accuracy, the system streamlines the entire lifecycle from on-site readings to administrative validation enabling real-time monitoring, faster service delivery, and data-driven decision-making. It empowers utility providers to modernize operations, enhance customer experience, and ensure operational excellence across departments.

title: Financial Management System
description: A comprehensive web-based financial management solution. Tailored for enterprise use, it streamlines the company’s financial operations, accounting processes, and document workflows across multiple departments and hierarchical units.The system manages three core financial document types:Treasury Operations (cash transactions),Bank Operations (checks and transfers),Adjustment Entries (reconciliations and corrections).Each module supports full document lifecycle management creation, editing, approvals, attachments, and reporting.It features multi-level organizational structuring, a four-tier chart of accounts, and role-based access control for precise user permissions. Bulk processing, comprehensive audit trails, and multi-format file attachments (PDF, Excel, images) enhance operational efficiency and compliance.Built with an Arabic RTL interface, the system generates formal, approval-ready financial documents with digital and printable formats. It empowers finance, accounting, treasury, audit, and executive teams with real-time visibility, accurate reporting, and full compliance with accounting standards while accommodating complex, multi-layered workflows.

title: SMS Sender
description: The application will allow to send bulk SMS. It will be necessary to plan the sending through a web interface. It will be a distributed application composed of: A web interface for monitoring and planning the sending of text messages, Several Android smartphones on which the client service will be responsible for sending (native Android application), A MySQL database, A Web API that will be the interface for native client applications. The goal is to be able to plan a list of SMS sendings (Numbers, message and date of sending will be configured). The SMS will be sent via one or more Android smartphones on which a native application will be installed, which will be responsible for recovering this flow and sending. It will also be possible to monitor these sendings through a web interface, and obtain reports of successful and failed sending. Finally, the interface should allow you to configure the devices themselves.

title: Easy Way Web
description: Official Company Website That Display All Company Services And Latest Projects And Help User to Know More About it And Contact With Them.

title: Silaa POS
description: A POS system allows your business to accept payments from customers and keep track of sales. It sounds simple enough, but the setup can work in different ways. POS system calculates the price of the item, including any sales tax. Then the system updates the inventory count to show that the item is sold. This system contain many features that help business on all sales fields like sales operations, clients data, payments and history and help owner to manage employees salaries and audits and there statistics.

title: Silaa Landing Page

User version help user to find doctor and make appointment and support a lot of different services as emergency and pharmacies consultations and too much more services.
